title.rendered: “If You Want To Grow & Achieve New Heights In Marketing, Choose Digiperform.” – Anamika Bhati

content.rendered:
#DigiperformStory

Meet Digiperformer Anamika Bhati, a Gorgeous, Confident, and Motivated lady from Delhi, who loves to travel and read. Since her school days, Anamika was attractive towards the marketing field, and that’s the reason despite being raised in the family of lawyers, she decided to pursue her career in the marketing field. Presently, she is working as a Project Manager at Digitangle Consulting Pvt. Ltd. She oversees and supervises all the digital marketing related projects for the organization. In a chit-chat session, she shared why she decided to choose digital marketing as a career and opted Digiperform to be part of her journey.

Digiperform: It’s a pleasure to connect with you! Before heading further, we would like to know a bit about you.

Anamika: Hi, Thanks for providing the platform to share my thoughts and experience with others. Professionally, I did  MBA in Marketing from Ashland University – Ohio. I love to travel and explore new places. And usually, you will find me reading books, in my free time.

Digiperform: What originally attracted you to choose digital marketing as your career?

Anamika: I wanted to achieve new heights in my marketing career. Subsequently, I did research on the market and found Digital Marketing as the most prosperous industry and also relevant to my profile. Post doing research, I discussed it with my friends and colleagues as well and came to know more about the scope and benefits of Digital Marketing. And finally, I decided to pursue the Certification Course in Digital Marketing.

Digiperform: What exactly makes us stand out from the competition & urge you to choose us over others?

I was quite impressed by the positive reviews and comments, which I have received from my friends who completed the certification course from Digiperform. Moreover, I was looking for the best digital marketing institute in Noida, located near to my office. I found Digiperform reliable and the Leading Institute in Digital Marketing education. So, I decided to join Digiperform.

When asked about the training experience in Digiperform, Anamika said – 

“My experience with Digiperform was great. I learned a lot from Digiperform. If it was possible, I would have given 11/10 points for the exceptionally great support and guidance.” Praising the trainers, she said – “If you want to grow & achieve new heights in marketing, choose Digiperform.”

Thanks, Anamika for being the part of Digiperform. We wish you good luck! You’ll definitely be going to shine in your career.
